TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RemoteControlPlayState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState Buffering = int32(8)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which is buffering data to play before it can start or resume playback.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState Error = int32(9)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which cannot perform any playback related operation because of an internal error. Examples of such situations are no network connectivity when attempting to stream data from a server, or expired user credentials when trying to play subscription-based content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState FastForwarding = int32(4)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which is fast forwarding in the media it is currently playing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState Paused = int32(2)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which is paused.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState Playing = int32(3)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which is playing media.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState Rewinding = int32(5)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which is fast rewinding in the media it is currently playing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState SkippingBackwards = int32(7)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which is skipping back to the previous logical chapter (such as a song in a playlist) in the media it is currently playing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState SkippingForwards = int32(6)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which is skipping to the next logical chapter (such as a song in a playlist) in the media it is currently playing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState Stopped = int32(1)

summary.para: Playback state of a RemoteControlClient which is stopped.
